name: SG Loans
intro: Lending platform based on Teller protocol
introduce: SG Loans is a decentralized and unsecured lending market built on the Teller protocol and in partnership with Signum Capital, empowers users to obtain personal unsecured loans without the need of a bank or traditional loan provider. SG Loans is the first unsecured DeFi lending platform for Singaporean consumers, and unlocks opportunities previously exclusive to traditional finance.
